rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area that combines the entrance with a living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light, while ensuring privacy and Vastu alignment. The layout encourages positive energy flow from the main entry.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious bedroom with en-suite bathroom, ample storage, and a balcony for relaxation. Floor-to-ceiling windows are incorporated on the south-east side to enhance Vastu harmony.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed guest bedroom with integrated wardrobe and window seating area. The west-facing window ensures ample daylight while aligning with Vastu principles by avoiding the north-west position for rest areas.

rooms.name: Utility Room & Kitchen
rooms.description: A combined space for utility purposes including a kitchenette and storage area. The design ensures efficient workflow, ample lighting, and maintains Vastu principles by positioning the kitchen in an auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated space for home entertainment with soundproofing, ambient lighting, and floor-to-ceiling windows on a west-facing wall to capture the evening light, aligning with both luxury aesthetics and Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Balcony / Terrace
rooms.description: An open space adjoining the master bedroom for relaxation and enjoying views. The design incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows on the balcony to maximize light, adhering to Vastu principles of openness.

openings.description: Large windows providing natural light and visual connectivity with the exterior. Carefully oriented to enhance Vastu energy flow.
Doorways leading to the balcony, ensuring easy access while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Kids Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A playful yet serene bedroom designed with ample natural light and ventilation. Floor-to-ceiling windows are positioned to harness sunlight in the morning.

rooms.name: Kids Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another comfortable space for children, focusing on safety and functionality, with Vastu-aligned window placements.

rooms.name: Study / Home Office
rooms.description: A versatile room equipped for work and study. The design includes a large window to ensure abundant natural light while adhering to Vastu principles for mental clarity.

openings.description: Windows designed to maximize daylight and promote a conducive environment for studying or working.
Access points to the balcony, enhancing natural ventilation and light.

design_principles: Vastu-aligned orientation with careful placement of windows and rooms.
Integration of floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and aesthetics.
Brutalist design elements reflecting robust, raw material usage.
